title: No 3v3 ranked after 2 years of the oceanic server being up.......
body:
I just come back from a long break to find out they still haven't released 3's.

As soon as the terrible game mode "team builder" was released oceanic instantly released it.

Like what the hell is going on?

replies.body: why would you even want to play 3v3 ranked? 3v3 isnt played professionally , so why bother with a ranked system for that mode at all...
its bullshit reguardless of how many people play we should have the priverlage of playing 3v3 if NA do
Not enough population etc blah blah blah... Maybe one day... Probably not...
